      • canAffortResources

        public boolean canAffortResources(int mineralPrice,
                                  int gasPrice)
        General function to determine if the Player can afford a certain amount of minerals / gas.
        Parameters:
        mineralPrice - the minerals which are going to be needed.
        gasPrice - the gas that is going to be needed.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the Player can afford both prices.
